mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hf_payment_account(com_account_id,com_account_class_id,hf_type,payment_month,payment_status) select ca.com_account_id,cac.com_account_class_id,cac.hf_type,cac.com_hf_month,if(ca.payment_way=1,2,1) from hf_com_account_class cac INNER JOIN hf_com_account ca ON ca.com_account_id=cac.com_account_id where cac.is_active=1 and ca.is_active=1 and IFNULL(cac.end_type ,0)=0 and cac.com_hf_month is not null and not EXISTS(select 1 from hf_payment_account pa where pa.com_account_class_id=cac.com_account_class_id and pa.payment_month=cac.com_hf_month)
